column4: ɔno na Israelmba nyinara; na wɔbaa Jordan do
column5: na wɔkyeer nseraban wɔ hɔ ansaana worutwa."

column3: ahwɛdofo no tui dɔɔ nseraban no mu;"

column4: Sɛ hom hu EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn n’ahyɛmudaka no
column5: na Levifo asɔfo a wɔso no a
column6: ɔno hom ntu mfi hom ananmu na hom ndzi ekyir nkɔ;"

column2: "ama hom eehu kwan kor a ɔwɔ dɛ hom fa do; osiandɛ hom mmfaa kwan yi do da gyedɛ ndɛ. Mbom
column3: hom mma ɔkwan a wosusu a ɔbɛyɛ basafa apem nda hom nye ahyɛmudaka no ntamu: na mma hom mmbɛn no."
Hom ntsew homho: na ɔkyena EWURADZE bɛyɛ hom mu anwanwadze."

column5: na hom ntwa mu nkedzi ɔman no enyim. Na wɔmaa ahyɛmudaka no do

column3: Ndɛ da yi na mebɛhyɛ ase mama wo do wɔ Israel nyinara enyi do
column5: dɛ mbrɛ midzii Moses ekyir no

column2: "Na hyɛ asɔfo a wɔso ahyɛmudaka no
column4: Sɛ hom du Jordan nsu no no nkɔkɔnoa a
column5: hom ngyina dzinn wɔ Jordan no mu."

column3: Hom mbra ha mbetsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne nsɛm."
Ɔnam iyi do na hom dze bohu dɛ tseasefo Nyankopɔn no wɔ hom mu
column4: na dɛ ɔpam ara na ɔbɛpam Keenanfo
column10: nye Jebusfo no nyinara efi hom enyim."

column3: asaase nyinara Wura ahyɛmudaka no rutwa mu edzi hom enyim akɔ Jordan mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom nyiyi Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu mbanyin duebien

column3: aber a asɔfo a wɔso EWURADZE
column6: hɔn anamɔn besi Jordan no nsu mu no
column8: mekyerɛ nsu a ɔpem fi etsifi ba no a; na wɔabɔ kuw kor egyina hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔman no tui fii hɔn asesee mu a nna asɔfo no a wɔso ahyɛmudaka no dzi hɔn enyim."
"Nna Jordan yir kata no nsukɔn nyinara do buber nyinara naaso
column3: aber a asɔfo a wɔso adaka no dur Jordan do
column4: na hɔn anan sii nsu no nkɔkɔnoa no ara pɛr
column6: "nna nsu a ɔpem fi etsifi ba no gyinae
column10: kurow no a ɔwɔ Zaretan ne nkyɛn no noho: na dza ɔpem kɔ Araba po a ɔnoara nye Nkyen Epo no mu no twaa koraa: na ɔman no twae faa Jeriko tsentsendo."

column2: "Na asɔfo a wɔso EWURADZE n’ahyɛmudaka no gyinaa daadze kɛsɛɛ do pintsinn wɔ Jordan ne finimfin
column3: na Israel nyinara nam daadze kɛsɛɛ do twae araa dze kodur dɛ ɔman no nyinara wiee Jordan twa."
